metadata.title: CVE-2014-3539 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description:
base/oi/doa.py in the Rope library in CPython (aka Python) allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code by leveraging an unsafe call to pickle.load.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2014-3539` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python3-rope - 0.10.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: rope package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.10.5-2').
